channel.title: startup weekend on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in startup weekend on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: London Startup Weekend will be back
item.description: So London Startup Weekend will happen - it has taken a lot longer to get the next weekend event going then we all thought.

item.title: Announcing Cambridge Startup Weekend December 10 - 12
item.description: Cambridge Startup Weekend (http://cambridge.startupweekend.org) will take place December 10 – 11 - 12 2010 in just over 6 weeks at the Hauser Forum in Cambridge.

item.title: London Startup Weekend June 4 - 6 tickets on sale
item.description: Damien Saunders is organising the next London Startup Weekend (http://london.startupweekend.org) @startuplondon which will take place June 4 – 5 - 6 2010 in just under a month at the IBM offices on London’s Southbank.
